segments.text: Hello . I need to reserve a room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not a problem . May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hi , sir . My name is Michelle . Could you tell me when you need the room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right now . I plan to be there in April from the 14th to the 17th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you didn't know that we have new room rates . Do you find that acceptable , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe . How much is a room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fantastic ! Would you like a smoking or nonsmoking room ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That'll be nonsmoking . Now , do you approve of a single queen-size bed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm happy to hear that , sir . Your reservation is all set except for your phone number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 626-555-1739 . Thank you for doing business with us , Mr . Sandals .
segments.speaker: S2
